description: Try our easy to follow Lemon & Oregano Marinated Split Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lemon & Oregano Marinated Split Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C or BBQ oven to medium.

Place chicken onto a chopping board, breast side down. Using a sharp knife or poultry shears, cut along both sides of the back bone, remove and discard. Turn chicken over and make a few slashes through skin and into meat. Place chicken into a large heatproof ceramic dish.
Combine oil, lemon rind and juice, oregano leaves and garlic in a bowl. Pour over prepared chicken. Season with salt and pepper. Stand for 30 minutes if time allows.
Roast chicken for 1 hour or until cooked through. Stand for 10 minutes before cutting into serving size pieces. Put chicken pieces onto a platter and drizzle with pan juices. Serve
